name: Waiting in the Sky (Ed Curtis-Sivess)
description: Audio is required, I'm afraid. Waiting in the Sky is a game about watching an alien race, Humans, waiting for the right time to make contact. The entire game is played on one screen as you screen radio transmissions on the in-game computer screen. It was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 31 with the theme "Entire Game on One Screen".
